thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 05 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Conviviality Plc Says Now In Administration

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Conviviality Plc Says Now In Administration

organizations.name: brief-conviviality plc says now in administration

text:
April 5 (Reuters) - Conviviality PLC:
* APPOINTMENT OF ADMINISTRATORS/NOMAD RESIGNATION * ‍APPOINTED MATTHEW CALLAGHAN, IAN GREEN AND DAVID BAXENDALE OF PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP AS JOINT ADMINISTRATORS TO CONVIVIALITY PLC​
* ‍COMPANIES NOW IN ADMINISTRATION ARE CONVIVIALITY PLC AND CONVIVIALITY BRANDS LIMITED​
* ‍NO OTHER COMPANIES IN GROUP HAVE HAD ADMINISTRATORS APPOINTED AND SUCH OTHER COMPANIES CONTINUE TO TRADE​
* ‍CONTINUES TO ENGAGE WITH PARTIES INTERESTED IN ITS RETAIL BUSINESS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
